comments.name: Mild Orange
comments.comment: This is a Complete course on angular. perfect examples and assignments. Great job Milos and team !!

comments.name: Udemy
comments.comment: This is a good course, I learned a lot on new things and already used some of these in the real world project.

comments.name: Stride
comments.comment: like to course but when you have question, it's hard to get response in timely manner. Other than that, i like the course

comments.name: Patrick Kulubi
comments.comment: Really interesting how the instructor uses different viewpoints to show how useful our work will be.

comments.name: Patrick Kulubi
comments.comment: This course is truly amazing. The way Rick and Ben explain the material makes it easy for newbies to start learning C# and Unity.

comments.name: Patrick Kulubi
comments.comment: The content seems right. The audio seems a bit weak in places. Could benefit from some structured coding exercises.
